title: Heritage-Listed Stay in Victoria’s Yarra Valley with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description: Escape the hustle and bustle of the city for the glorious vineyards of the Yarra Valley, Australia’s premium wine region, staying at the stunning Chateau Yering Hotel. Housed in a heritage-listed building and offering sweeping views over the Yarra Valley, this is the perfect location for a romantic escape, filled with gourmet dining inclusions such as daily à la carte breakfast, a cheese platter and a bottle of wine on arrival, a sumptuous A$100 dining credit per room, per stay, to spend at any onsite restaurant and a wine-tasting voucher for three of the best wineries in the area.
